item.title: MIUI OS1.1.4.0.VNCEUXM Fastboot update for Xiaomi 14 EEA
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Xiaomi 14 EEA

Codename: houji

Version: OS1.1.4.0.VNCEUXM | 15.0

Size: 8.2 GB

MD5: e149d8c2973c5a8f14a02d561dafee46

Changelog:
[Home screen]
Optimization: Folder icons weren't always fully displayed
Optimization: An issue when a lot of space in the upper part of the screen was left blank in the Home screen layout
Fix: Home screen stopped working in some cases
[Lock screen]
Fix: The screen flashed when adjusting Always-on display settings
[Recents]
Fix: App card started shaking when card order was rearranged
[Other improvements and optimizations]
Fix: Screenshots turned out black for some apps

Download: Here

item.title: MIUI OS2.0.7.0.VNCCNXM Fastboot update for Xiaomi 14 China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Xiaomi 14 China

Codename: houji

Version: OS2.0.7.0.VNCCNXM | 15.0

Size: 9.4 GB

MD5: 2d9f161462f9b67fdcbb29dba9569900

Changelog:
[System]
Optimization: Occasional frame drop issue in some apps during scrolling
Fix: Song info couldn't be displayed in the car system when connecting to the vehicle via Bluetooth
Fix: Errors occurred when opening apps in some cases
Fix: Screen flashed after opening certain games
Fix: Some UI elements weren't displayed correctly
[Super wallpapers]
Fix: Always-on display clock wasn't displayed when Super wallpapers were applied
[Floating windows]
Fix: Floating window display issues when using Split screen in landscape mode
[Xiaomi HyperAI]
Optimization: Optimized AI search on-device algorithms to prevent device overheating and decrease power consumption
[Status bar, Notification shade]
New: Notification spotlight support for Mi Fitness

Download: Here

item.title: MIUI OS2.0.1.0.VNCTWXM Fastboot update for Xiaomi 14 Taiwan
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Xiaomi 14 Taiwan

Codename: houji

Version: OS2.0.1.0.VNCTWXM | 15.0

Size: 7.3 GB

MD5: 21d3ee3401c607e4c3fedc6a541a3fc0

Changelog:
[System]
Updated the security patch to November 2024. Increased system security.
[Alive Design Philosophy]
Alive Design Philosophy unveils fresh, vibrant design across the whole system, making every interaction feel smooth and alive.
All-new Artistic Lock screen:
Artistic Lock screen brings new templates and effects inspired by classic designs, giving your device a cinematic look every time you unlock it.
All-new Weather
Real-time Weather Engine 2.0 shows you the sky and clouds just like in real life – even lets you see rainbows and the Milky Way.
All-new Calendar:
The new Desktop calendar adds a touch of ritual to your day.
All-new Clock:
Updated Clock uses a more refined display structure for a more elegant, easy-to-read look.
Updated animations:
A full-scale animation upgrade makes every interaction flow smoothly and feel stable, responsive, and comfortable.
[Xiaomi HyperCore]
Xiaomi HyperCore, Xiaomi's proprietary core technology platform, enhances performance, graphics, network, and security.
New dynamic memory:
New technology allows precise resource allocation, so apps start up faster.
Upgraded rendering:
Upgraded rendering for multitasking extends battery life.
Heterogeneous computing:
Enhanced rendering pipeline boosts hardware performance for faster, more efficient visuals.
[Xiaomi HyperConnect]
Upgraded cross-device connectivity framework.
Upgraded Home screen+:
You can drag phone apps onto Xiaomi tablets or add them as native apps.

Download: Here
